name: fatal frontier
description:
Controls (credits at bottom)

W = hope
D = mad
A = question
S = doom
E = imagine

Random emotional events every 30 seconds

Ending after 620 seconds

Story

For many intrepid explorers who happen to find their way into large and graceful starships space is rightly called the final frontier

Yet for those who are alone

Those trapped in the void

Those who have lost control over almost everything

Space is better named...

 the Fatal Frontier

Credits

Made in Scratch

thanks to G.H. for artwork

backgrounds from NASA public domain image galleries
